events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position. The resume highlights strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorised under the engineering department based on keywords like ‘software engineer’ and ‘devops’ appearing in the candidate's profile.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage this candidate’s recruitment process for the developer role, preparing for the upcoming screening stage.
The initial phone screening was conducted successfully. The candidate demonstrated solid knowledge of software development practices and DevOps tooling.
Received a positive response from the candidate confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled next week. They expressed enthusiasm about the role.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC, focusing on backend development and system design aspects relevant to the software engineer position.
